metadata.title: CVE-2018-17580 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A heap-based buffer over-read exists in the function fast_edit_packet() inthe file send_packets.c of Tcpreplay v4.3.0 beta1. This can lead to Denialof Service (DoS) and potentially Information Exposure when the applicationattempts to process a crafted pcap file.

criterions.comment: tcpreplay: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
